channel.title: Robotaxis on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Robotaxis on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tesla Proposes a Trillion-Dollar Bet That It's More Than Just Cars
item.description: Tesla’s board wants to give Elon Musk an unprecedented $1 trillion pay package. To get all the money, he has to make robots and robotaxis work.

item.title: Tesla Proposes a Trillion-Dollar Bet That It's More Than Just Cars
item.description: Tesla’s board wants to give Elon Musk an unprecedented $1 trillion pay package. To get all the money, he has to make robots and robotaxis work.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-driving cars.

item.title: Tesla Readies a Taxi Service in San Francisco—but Not With Robotaxis
item.description: The electric car maker informed California that it will operate a limited public taxi service. But it’s not legally allowed to do this with self-driving cars.

item.title: Did Tesla’s Robotaxi Launch Backfire?
item.description: Survey data shared exclusively with WIRED suggests that Tesla’s newest autonomous driving technology has freaked out some consumers.
